content.rendered:
Voula

Esthetician English/Greek/French

Voula has been an esthetician for over 25 years. she offers an elevated level of service using her education FROM both cANADA AND PARIS. She continues to grow her expertise and stays up to date on the latest spa trends. Voula ‘does it all’ including advanced nail services, medical services and specialty facials. she develops our spa menu to meet the needs of our guests and works to create a dynamic and welcoming ENVIRONMENT for THE SPA. She offers expert advise and product KNOWLEDGE to create your perfect at home routine. vISIT HER FOR HER POLISh, skillfullness AND CLIENT CARE.

Genowefa “jEN-OH-WAY-FAH”

Esthetician English/Polish

Genowefa has been working at York Street Spa since 2004. We count ourselves lucky to have a team mate who has such extensive industry KNOWLEDGE and has ‘seen it all’. Genowefa is known for her great sense of humor and professionalism. her specialties include offering fast, painless body waxing and exceptional aveda facial services.

Tanya

Medical Esthetician - Eyelash Technician

Tanya has been an esthetician for over 20 years. she continues to grow her craft with education and staying up to date on the latest ESTHETIC trends. she specializes in advanced nail care like bio gel, shellac, EXTENSIONS and dip. she has been offering eyelash EXTENSIONS as a specialty service for 10 years. tanya truly goes above and beyond for her guests in both quality of service and guest experience.

Melanie

Esthetician English/French

Has over 25 years of experience in esthetics.Specializing in facials and acrylic nails. She is also a certified Laser Technician.Loves to make clients feel extra special.

Marcia

Esthetician

Marcia esthetician Marcia has over 30 years of experience as an esthetician after completing her training in Ottawa at Versailles ACADEMY. Marcia’s expertise lies in creating an ideal guest experience being known for her ‘magic’ touch. She recognizes that the Spa is an Oasis from outdoor stresses and she has an unmatched skill to guide you into relaxation. her ability to create longstanding relationships with her guests is a real TESTAMENT to her passion for the industry, esthetic skill and love for the clients. You can experience Marcia’s EXPERTISE in her facials and pedicures or visit her for any of our spa services.

Sasha @S.JADE.W

Esthetician Eyelash & Microblading Technician

Sasha’s passion for Makeup Artistry was what drew her to the beauty industry; Sine 2009 She has been able to express her creativity as a makeup artist. In 2013 She decided to expand her knowledge to esthetics and has taken her skill set to the next level with her continued education. York Street Spa is thrilled to have Sasha as our resident Microblading Technician and brow expert. Sasha is known for her professionalism, PUNCTUALITY and attention to detail.

Bethany

Esthetician

Has over 25 years of experience in esthetics.Specializing in facials and acrylic nails. She is also a certified Laser Technician.Loves to make clients feel extra special.

Andrea

Esthetician English/Spanish

Andrea is originally from santiago, chile. She is an esthetician with over 20 years of experience in the industry and is very passionate about her craft. She specializes in brazilian waxing, pedicures, facials and nail art. Her goal is to give her clients the most enjoyable experience when visiting the spa, it is no wonder why she has created a bond with her long standing clientele.
